title: Escape Cupid's Arrows: Turn to Madan Mohan | Sri Amitasana Dasa
speaker: HG Amitasana Dasa

segments.key_quote: If we have experienced real love. Real beauty of the Lord, then we will experience that satisfaction.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that by surrendering to Krishna (Madan Mohan) and experiencing divine love, one can overcome lusty desires and the enchantment of material beauty.
